description: This file defines the EnumVariable class, which represents an instance of an enumeration used as a variable within a software project, with associated methods for code generation, reference resolution, and interaction with JSON and C code.

classes.name: EnumVariable
classes.description: Represents an enumeration variable instance with methods for code generation and reference resolution.

methods.name: EnumVariable(ICEnumVariable bean)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes EnumVariable from an ICEnumVariable bean.

methods.name: EnumVariable(EnumDefinition def)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes EnumVariable from an EnumDefinition.

methods.name: getVarName
methods.description: Returns the variable name used in code or container.

methods.name: setVarName
methods.description: Sets the variable name, marking the object as an instance.

methods.name: getEnumRef
methods.description: Returns the reference name of the enumeration definition.

methods.name: setEnumRef
methods.description: Sets the reference name for the enumeration definition.

methods.name: setDefinition
methods.description: Sets the associated EnumDefinition object.

methods.name: hasVarName
methods.description: Indicates if the variable has a name and can be used in a container.

methods.name: getValues
methods.description: Returns a list of string values from the enum definition.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Resolves the EnumDefinition reference via Processor.

methods.name: isEnum
methods.description: Returns true, indicating this is an enum variable.

methods.name: getCtype
methods.description: Returns the C type name, same as getName.

methods.name: getDefinition
methods.description: Returns the associated EnumDefinition.

methods.name: generateNativeLabels
methods.description: Indicates if native labels should be generated.

methods.name: generateNativeShortNames
methods.description: Indicates if native short names should be generated.

methods.name: getNativeStructString
methods.description: Returns C struct enum typedef string for the enum.

methods.name: getNativeLabelsArrayString
methods.description: Returns C array of label strings for the enum.

methods.name: getNativeShortNameArrayString
methods.description: Returns C array of short name strings for the enum.

methods.name: getJavaType
methods.description: Returns the Java type name for the enum.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Returns the JSON key name for the enum.

methods.name: getJavaGetter
methods.description: Generates Java getter code snippet.

methods.name: getJavaSetter
methods.description: Generates Java setter code snippet.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to encode the enum into JSON.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to decode the enum from JSON.

methods.name: generateJavaTransport
methods.description: Creates Java transport code for enum values.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code to encode the enum into JSON.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code to decode the enum from JSON.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns the Java IPC object type name.
